about_the_game:
is a chilling first-person indie horror exploration game that takes you through the dark corridors of an abandoned school. As you navigate the hallways, you unravel a haunting mystery that surrounds this school. Armed only with a flashlight, you must cautiously venture through the foreboding atmosphere, uncovering secrets, solving puzzles, and encountering supernatural encounters along the way. As you go into the depths of the school, your courage will be tested, and the line between reality and nightmares will blur. Prepare to face your fears as you explore the dark school corridors, where every creak and whisper may be a harbinger of impending doom.


Game starts like a normal day in a school, but when you fall asleap in your class room, but when you will wake up, school is already abadoned and comletely covered in darkness.
Where are your friends? What happend to them? You will have to find out.





🔴 Explore abadoned school comlex in coplete darkness, your only companioun is your flashlifht. But dont forget to change your batteries or else your survival is impossible.


🔴 Run and Hide from variety of monsters that haunt this school comlex.


🔴 Collect items. You can find items that can help you survive.

name: After School

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 750ti
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Indie horror game, in which you will explore cursed school complex.
